summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinances Nos. 6200, 18158, 18752, 18927, 19356, 19533, 19536, 19584, 21232, 23524, 24458, 24838, 28334, 28692, 29949, 29024, 30868, 31180 and 31402, relating to the construction, erection, alteration arrangement, equipment, repair, use and occupation of buildings and structures, and the use and occupation of land and premises by and in connection with buildings and structures.
